semano.rulestore

Class RuleStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • semano.rulestore.RuleStore

  • public class RuleStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the key class to be used as part of the Java API It represents s rule store that can load a rule base and provides various access methods for rules and japelates.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RuleStore.Type
      This is the type of an annotation rule (concept or relation).

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuleStore

        public RuleStore(java.lang.String jprulesDir,
                 java.lang.String japelatesDir)
        main constructor. loads rules and japelates frm the provided directory paths
        Parameters:
        jprulesDir - directory that contains subfolders for rules of type CONCEPT and RELATION which in tern contain JP files
        japelatesDir - directory that contains japelate files

      • saveRules

        public void saveRules(java.lang.String entityIRI)
        writes rules of the given entity back to the harddrive
        Parameters:
        entityIRI - the ontology entity for which the rules need to be saved

      • saveRule

        public void saveRule(java.lang.String ruleID)
        writes all rules of the entity containing the rule with the given rule ID back to the harddrive
        Parameters:
        ruleID - that belongs to the ontology entity for which the rules need to be saved

      • getRules

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<AnnotationRule>> getRules(RuleStore.Type type)
        retrieves loaded rules for the given type sorted into sets according to ontology entities
        Parameters:
        type - the type (concept, relation) of rules to be retrieved
        Returns:
        an associative array containing a set of rules per ontology entities

      • getRules

        an associative array containing a set of rules per ontology entities

      • deleteRules

        public void deleteRules()

      • deleteRules

        public void deleteRules(java.lang.String entityIRI)
        removes the loaded rule of the given ontology entity from the rule base
        Parameters:
        entityIRI - the IRI of the ontology entity for which to remove the rules

      • updateRule

        public void updateRule(AnnotationRule rule)
        updates the rule within the rule base. While rules are not immutable, the index structures of the rule base need to be updated when a rules changes.
        Parameters:
        rule - to be updated within the rule base

      • getJprulesDir

        public java.lang.String getJprulesDir()
        returns the directory that contains subfolders for rules of type CONCEPT and RELATION which in tern contain JP files
        Returns:
        the currently used path to the JP Rules directory

      • setJprulesDir

        public void setJprulesDir(java.lang.String jprules)
        sets the directory that contains subfolders for rules of type CONCEPT and RELATION which in tern contain JP files
        Parameters:
        jprules - the new path to the JP Rules directory
